div.div: Case Overview > Case Details > Select Services > Additional Details
All fields required unless otherwise noted

div.label: To what URL should this link go?

div.div: Include any case documents we will need, give your files meaningful names that will identify them later
This site can acept PDF, DICOM,GIF,PNG,JPG,DOC/DOCX, XLSX. If your document is in another format please call us a xxx-xxx-xxxx
